welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hamilton, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Pearl
restaurants.description: Pearl is a sushi restaurant located in Hamilton.

restaurants.name: Flanagan's Irish Pub & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Flanagan's Irish Pub & Restaurant is a restaurant located in Hamilton.

restaurants.name: Beluga Bar
restaurants.description: Beluga Bar is a sushi restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: House of India
restaurants.description: House of India is a indian restaurant located in Hamilton.

restaurants.name: Devil's Isle Cafe
restaurants.description: Devil's Isle Cafe is a restaurant located in Hamilton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport is used for transporting goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
